title: Put SIM from Pixel to Pixel 2 XL & stuck in loop "..Almost Ready" "Adding.." "Just A.." "Checking.."
content:
I have rebooted. I have hard reset. I have removed the SIM and attempted to restart the process.
It is stuck at the end stages of set up.
"Your phone's almost ready." so I touch 'Done'
"Adding Finishing Touches"
"Just A Sec"
"Checking for Updates"
and then it goes back to "Your phone's almost ready."
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
